p: Approximately 0.5 g of the dried powders were weighted accurately, transferred to extraction tubes and mixed with 40 mL of the extragent (60% acetone solution in 0.5% formic acid) [ 35]. The extraction was conducted on an orbital shaker at room temperature for one h. Afterward, the samples were centrifuged (6000Ã— g) and supernatants were further used for antioxidant activity determination and analysis of total polyphenols and flavonoids.
